name: Realm Architect
description:
Are you tired of spending hours of preparation time on your campaigns? 
Sick of these scene based approaches that modern VTT's offer?
Looking for a way to build a more immersive world? 
You'd like to spend less time looking at your rulebook for references? 

Realm Architect is the answer! In this prototype we have combined the best features that Virtual Tabletops, single player roleplaying games & worldbuilding tools offer into one single tool! 

Download it and test it out, break it if you have to and give us your feedback on the tool and what we should add or delete as features! Think it sucks? You can tell us that too!
